data.actual_result: Role overflow arrow is placed strangely inside of the Role UI modal
data.expected_result: Role overflow arrow placed correctly where it belongs (no idea where it belongs as it has never been correctly placed, but I assume outside of the modal)
data.short_description: Misplaced role overflow arrow on Role UI modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Have permission to access the Members section in a server and open it - Find a user with enough roles to give the Role UI option - Open the Role UI modal and observe the top left
